## Bio

I'm a Data Analyst based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

Over the past years, I have a good track record of analyzing large and complex data sets and provide actionable insights towards both Government and Private entities.

My passion is in data extraction, data cleaning, visualization, creating dashboards and basic GIS.

This website is created for me to showcase bits and parts of my personal works and experience.

You can contact me through email : abdullahzubair.wh\@gmail.com
